sentences.en: ' Ah! most gracious Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, where is that emigrant?
sentences.cn: 啊, 最仁慈的前侯爵先生, 那外满贵族在哪儿?

sentences.en: A greater degree of wisdom than heretofore as regards the ends of life is becoming imperative.
sentences.cn: 有比以往更高度明智的生活目标已成为迫切需要.

sentences.en: All the pieces line up in different ways than they have heretofore.
sentences.cn: 所有的情节碎片将组合起来,展示出和迄今为止不一样的内容.

sentences.en: Gardening? whether backyard or balcony? fills a heretofore unmet need.
sentences.cn: 不管是在庭院或是阳台,园艺都填补了人们迄今未曾得到满足的需求.

sentences.en: Globalization is the tremendous drive force of heretofore in the future.
sentences.cn: 全球化是迄今往后的巨大驱动力量.

sentences.en: Heretofore , foreign and domestic researchers have studied ship lifetime and obtain many achievements.
sentences.cn: 一直以来, 国内外研究人员对船舶的寿命开展了大量有意义的研究工作.

sentences.en: Heretofore all the campus gossip had seemed merely malicious and disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 在这以前,学校里的一切流言蜚语似乎纯粹是恶意的、无礼的.

sentences.en: Heretofore, doctors have tried low fat diets to reduce the cholesterol in the blood.
sentences.cn: 迄今, 医生一直试用低脂肪饮食来降低血液中的胆固醇.

sentences.en: Heretofore, gear - shift schedules of most AT vehicles in the world are based upon static two - parameters.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止, 世界上大多数AT汽车所用自动变速器的换档规律特性都是以静态二参数为依据.

sentences.en: In recent years we have seen greater emphasis than heretofore on the voice of the consumer.
sentences.cn: 近年来我们发现消费者的意见比过去受到重视。

sentences.en: It was the same town as heretofore , but the same minister returned not from the forest.
sentences.cn: 镇子还是原来的镇子; 但从林中归来的牧师却不同了.

sentences.en: Oh Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, I pray you be you true to me!
sentences.cn: 啊,前侯爵先生, 我祈祷你也以真诚待我!

sentences.en: The parties heretofore acting as trustee.
sentences.cn: 在此以前作为受托人的当事人.

sentences.en: They reported that clouds are an important and heretofore uninvestigated contributor to the climate.
sentences.cn: 他们报告说，云是影响气候的一个重要因素，但迄今尚未进行过调查研究。

sentences.en: We place our best service, as heretofore, at your disposal.
sentences.cn: 任何时候,我们当一如既往听候贵方安排, 竭诚尽力服务.

sentences.en: We place our best services, as heretofore, at your disposal.
sentences.cn: 任何时候,我们当一如继往听候贵方安排, 竭诚尽力服务.

sentences.en: We will continue to hold meetings on Thursdays, as heretofore.
sentences.cn: 一如既往,我们将继续每星期四开会.

words.tran_cn: 直到此时，迄今为止；在这以前
